title: 你们用的什么解压软件
author: x5x52
txt_content:
我们的日常play the computer games 的时候，当然离不开解压

哪种解压软件更受欢迎呢？





你.PNG (14.94 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-8-2 12:12 上传

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
360压缩国际版

没广告，ui好看

replies.author: 亦音
replies.txt_content: winrar，懒得换

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content: bandizip+7zip

replies.author: 无谓z
replies.txt_content: windows自带的可香了

replies.author: _Shimmer_
replies.txt_content: win自带的太丑了 自己又懒得去自己下

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content: 之前用winrar，现在用bandzip

replies.author: 5中生有
replies.txt_content: 无广告版的好压，还有个备用的

replies.author: 神崎长闲
replies.txt_content: Bandizip天下第一，那个用国际版360的就是异类

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content: 用winrar，老牌了，有经验

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content: Bandizip 6.x 没广告，用起来舒服

replies.author: wishdsb
replies.txt_content: bandzip简洁好用

replies.author: Minecraft.Wnxi
replies.txt_content: 我也是360压缩国际版我和fhc都是异类，有种来打我呀

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 系统自带emmm

replies.author: A55778866579

在自己的以前的vps上预装的bandzip

replies.txt_content: 我用的2345好压

replies.author: 沙吉

replies.author: JohnnyLee0215
replies.txt_content: WinRAR用了多长时间了 因为平时需要把东西打成rar包传到OneDrive就一直没换

replies.author: 神烦的白狗
replies.txt_content: 用winrar一半原因是因为看着和用着习惯，另一半原因是懒得换）

replies.txt_content: winRAR用起来挺好的，基本没广告
